Uses of Interface
de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater.Inflater

  • Packages that use Inflater 
    Package Description
    de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater  
    de.mrapp.android.sidebar.view  

    • Uses of Inflater in de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater

      Classes in de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater that implement Inflater 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IdInflater
      An inflater, which allows to inflate views, which may be referenced by a resource id.
      class  InstanceInflater
      An inflater, which allows to inflate views, which are present as an instance of the class View.
      Methods in de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater that return Inflater 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Inflater InflaterFactory.createInflater(View view)
      Creates and returns an inflater, which allows to inflate view, which are present as an instance of the class View.

    • Uses of Inflater in de.mrapp.android.sidebar.view

      Constructors in de.mrapp.android.sidebar.view with parameters of type Inflater 
      Constructor and Description
      ContentView(Context context, Inflater inflater, int overlayColor)
      Creates a new custom view, which contains the content view of a sidebar, as well as a view, which is used as an overlay, while the sidebar is shown.
      SidebarView(Context context, Inflater inflater, Location location, Drawable sidebarBackground, int shadowWidth, int shadowColor)
      Creates a new custom view, which contains the sidebar view of a sidebar, as well as a view, which is used to visualize a shadow.
